response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, I am confident it will serve you well for years to come. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire such a high-quality item at a discounted rate. I trust you will find this offer compelling and hope we can discuss further how this product can benefit you.", "product_price": 11500}
